pageProps.title: spacy-streamlit
pageProps.teaser: spaCy building blocks for Streamlit apps

data.title: spacy-streamlit
data.slogan: spaCy building blocks for Streamlit apps
data.description: This package contains utilities for visualizing spaCy models and building interactive spaCy-powered apps with [Streamlit](https://streamlit.io). It includes various building blocks you can use in your own Streamlit app, like visualizers for **syntactic dependencies**, **named entities**, **text classification**, **semantic similarity** via word vectors, token attributes, and more.
code_example: default_text = "Sundar Pichai is the CEO of Google."
data.author: Ines Montani
